entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: W 25 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
